alert.note: Alert for East Otter Tail; Wadena; West Otter Tail; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 5:37PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Clay, southwestern Wadena, Otter Tail and southeastern Wilkin Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 537 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Rothsay to Bluffton. Movement was southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fergus Falls, Perham, Pelican Rapids, Ottertail Lake, Lake Lida, New York Mills and Parkers Prairie. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 34 and 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northwestern and west central Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: East Otter Tail; Wadena; West Otter Tail; Wilkin
